Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. We believe in delivering the best possible experience to our customers, and we're confident that this product will exceed your expectations. For a limited time, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $100. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive warranty and free shipping. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with your purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
